mapper.insert: insert into member(id, password, name, tel, cno, bno) values( #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{cno}, #{bno} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update member set password = #{password}, tel = #{tel} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from member m, work_management w where m.mno = w.mno and m.id = #{id} order by wno desc
mapper.insert: insert into work_management(mno,wDay,bno,startTime,endTime,wstatus) select #{mno},now(),#{bno},now(),null,#{wstatus} where not exists( select wDay from work_management where wDay = date(now()))
mapper.select: select m.mno, m.id , m.password, m.name, m.cno, m.bno, a.ano, a.auth from member m left join auth a on m.mno = a.mno where m.id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from auth where mno = #{mno} and auth = #{auth}
mapper.select: select ano, mno, auth from auth
select m.mno, m.id, m.name, m.tel, m.regDate, m.mStatus, m.cno, m.bno, a.ano, a.mno, a.auth from member m left join auth a on m.mno = a.mno where bno = #{bno}
